titles.title: Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to provide relief for servicemembers with respect to contracts for cellular phone service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/7/2007--Introduced. Servicemembers' Cellular Phone Contract Fairness Act of 2007 - Amends the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to allow members of the Armed Forces who are called to active duty for a period of not less than 90 days to cancel or suspend their cell phone contracts without incurring early termination or reactivation fees.
